- Location: Interior ceiling/upper wall vent; textured stucco finish around the grille.
- Material: Metal supply/return grille with horizontal slats; light gray paint.
- Condition: Dust/dirt visible on slats; no rust or damage; screws securing the frame.
- Function: Appears to be an HVAC return or exhaust vent; no visible obstructions from the exterior.
- Maintenance: Recommend cleaning the grille and inspecting ductwork for dust buildup.
